textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Measurements from size S Length: 33.5in / 85cm, from shoulder Measurements Size & Fit Measurements from size S Length: 33.5in / 85cm, from shoulder Measurements Imported, China. Dry clean. Lining: 100% polyester. Shell: 100% silk. Fabric: Silk chiffon. A watercolor floral print blooms over an airy silk Haute Hippie dress. Covered elastic adds volume to the blouson bodice and defines the waist, and the uneven hem curves longer in back. Sleeveless. Lined. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Haute Hippie takes you from inner to outer, day to night, and metropolis to sanctuary by emphasizing the art of layering and by embracing eclectic style and sophistication. As a single destination for fashion basics, layering items, and loungewear with a designer aesthetic and contemporary price, Haute Hippie provides inspired everyday looks and attainable luxury. Look sexy, be confident, and feel relaxed with an air of independence, freedom, and style.
